description:
Priest Mushin, the person who raised Miroku, is going to die. Miroku and the others are shocked. They ask to Mushin`s what he wants so that they can give him one last gift.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ein letztes Festmahl für Mirokus Meister
El último banquete del maestro Moushin
Miroku no Shishou Saigo no Utage
O último banquete do mestre de Miroku
The Last Banquet of Miroku`s Master
弥勒の師匠 最後の宴
